DOC.brief_summary: Long term safety ( 52 week ) GW685698X nasal mucosa via nasal biopsy active control group ( Nasonex® ) healthy volunteer control group subject 18 year old perennial allergic rhinitis . Allergic rhinitis inflammatory disorder upper airway occur follow allergen exposure . Perennial allergic rhinitis trigger house dust mite , animal dander , etc. , possibly cause symptom year-round include nasal congestion , rhinorrhea and/or nasal itching .
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Safety Of GW685698X Via Nasal Biopsy
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized , Open Label , Active Controlled ( Mometasone Furoate Aqueous Nasal Spray [ Nasonex® ] 200mcg QD ) , Parallel Group , Multi-Center , 52-Week Study Assess Long Term Safety GW685698X Aqueous Nasal Spray 100mcg QD via Nasal Biopsy Subjects > 18 Years Age Perennial Allergic Rhinitis ( PAR )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : History perennial allergic rhinitis 2 year , document positive allergen test appropriate allergen . Female patient childbearing potential must willing consistently correctly use acceptable method birth control . Exclusion criterion : Patients require certain medication allergy . Patients serious medical problem .
